name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doomsday Exam Countdown and Grade Calculator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your exam countdown and calculate the grades needed to pass or excel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doomsday Exam Countdown and Grade Calculator

Stay ahead of your exams with the Exam Countdown Chrome extension! Designed to help students manage their study time effectively, this extension provides a powerful tool to track your exam schedule and calculate your required scores to achieve your desired grades.

Key Features:
Dynamic Countdown Timer: Easily set your exam date and see a real-time countdown to the big day. The timer updates every second to keep you on track, with a dramatic effect as the exam approaches.

Score Calculation: Input your current scores, desired grades, and exam weight to calculate the exact score you need on your final exams to meet your academic goals. Manage multiple subjects with ease.

Motivational Messages: Receive inspiring messages to keep you motivated and focused on your studies. Stay encouraged with personalized quotes that boost your study morale.

Save and Manage Subjects: Add, edit, or remove subjects and save your calculations. Easily revisit your saved subjects and see what scores you need for each one.

Why Use This Extension?
Stay Organized: Keep track of your exam schedule and required scores in one convenient place.
Boost Your Performance: Use our calculations to target the exact scores you need to achieve your academic goals.
Stay Motivated: Access motivational quotes to keep your study sessions productive and positive.
Download the Exam Countdown & Study Planner extension today and take control of your exam preparation!
